item.title: EDA: Tech Giant Acquisitions, 1987 - 2018
item.description: Introduction A dataset published by Shivam Bansal tabulates acquisitions by 7 top tech companies, between the period 1987 - 2010. The companies covered by this dataset are - Apple Facebook Google IBM Microsoft Twitter Yahoo Combined, these companies have made 916 acquisitions over the four decades. The analysis section below presents a high level discussion of the data. Vizualisation Inspired by Shivam Bansal’s original work, as well as others who have presented analysis on this dataset, I set out to create aggregated data vizualisations for this dataset on Kaggle.
